name: 🆃🅷🅴 🆂🅸🅶🅽🅰🅻
description:
🆂🅾🅼🅴🆃🅷🅸🅽🅶 🆂🆃🆁🅰🅽🅶🅴 🅸🆂 🅷🅰🅿🅿🅴🅽🅸🅽🅶

STORY

It's your last day of work before the holidays, you are on duty in the subway of a small town on an island, and you will find yourself facing a strange radio signal that drives people crazy and to sleep!

GAMEPLAY

Everything takes place over the course of one night, until the protagonist manages to leave, leaving the mystery. The commands are shown in the game once started!

Please support me to  do other great games!
